org.apache.derbyTesting.unitTests.services

Class T_StandardException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.apache.derby.iapi.error.StandardException
          • org.apache.derbyTesting.unitTests.services.T_StandardException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    T_CacheException

    public class T_StandardException
extends org.apache.derby.iapi.error.StandardException
    A standard exception for testing. The messages for this exception are not localized or stored with the product.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
